David K. Caplan
Keats McFarland & Wilson LLP
9720 Wilshire Blvd., Penthouse Suite
Beverly Hills, CA 90212
U.S.A. 
Tel: (310) 248-3830

October 4, 2006 
 
 
VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL 
 
Everyones Internet
390 Benmar Suite 200
Houston TX
77060 
 
admin@ev1.net; noc@ev1.net admin2@ev1.net abuse@ev1.net   
 
Re:      UNAUTHORIZED USE OF DREAMWORKS ANIMATION SKG AND PARAMOUNT 
PICTURES CORPORATION
www.warez-news.com 
 
To Whom It May Concern: 
 
    We are writing to you on behalf of our client, DreamWorks Animation
SKG (hereinafter "DreamWorks Animation") and Paramount Pictures
Corporation ("Paramount").  DreamWorks Animation and Paramount are the
owner of rights in and to the "Over The Hedge" Motion Picture
(hereinafter referred to as "Over The Hedge").  No one is authorized to
copy, reproduce, distribute, or otherwise use Over The Hedge without the
express written permission of DreamWorks Animation and Paramount. 
 
    It has come to our attention that the web site located at
"http://www.warez-news.com/over-the-hedge-2006-ntsc-replica,20588.html,"

for which you are the service provider, is enabling the distribution of
infringing copies of "Over The Hedge" through the distribution of an
"Over the Hedge" torrent file. 
  
    DreamWorks Animation and Paramount have the good faith belief that
the use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by
DreamWorks Animation and Paramount, its agent or the law. DreamWorks
Animation and Paramount diligently enforces its rights in Over The Hedge
in all forms of media.  Our client rightfully takes its responsibility
for the protection of Over The Hedge very seriously. 
 
    As you may be aware, Internet Service Providers can be held liable
if they do not respond to claims of infringement pursuant to the
requirements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) and/or
international laws with similar effect.  In accordance with the DMCA, we
request your assistance in the removal of infringements of the Over The
Hedge from this web site and any other sites for which you act as an
Internet Service Provider.  We further declare under penalty of perjury
that we are authorized to act on behalf of DreamWorks Animation and
Paramount and that the information in this letter is accurate.  Please
contact me immediately to discuss this matter further. 
 
    Nothing contained in this letter constitutes an express or implied
waiver of any rights, remedies or defenses of DreamWorks Animation and
Paramount, all of which are expressly reserved. 
 
Very truly yours, 
          /s/
David K. Caplan 
  
Keats McFarland & Wilson LLP
